name: Medium clean up and best height
description: Clean up Medium (including Hacker Noon and other websites using Medium blog system), make the height of their pages' readable area comfortably larger by removing the post meter bar, open in app and upgrade membership notifications, the footer and other annoying parts, as well as reducing the header of the blog pages and making the metabar scrollable. Note that popped up notification is hidden, therefore if you want to signup / sign in to Medium, you must middle click the "Become a member / Sign in / etc." button to do that.
additional_info: Partly from Make Medium Readable Again (MMRA), a Google Chrome extension licensed under MIT License. Applied to domain names: medium.com hackernoon.com posts.specterops.io blog.0day.rocks blog.discordapp.com blog.ettic.ca arlogilbert.com medium.freecodecamp.org engineering.salesforce.com prototypr.io blog.framer.com uxplanet.org medium.muz.li upscri.be writingcooperative.com 500ish.com uxdesign.cc blog.productdisrupt.com journal.thriveglobal.com theuxblog.com freecodecamp.org itnext.io codeburst.io blog.bitsrc.io logrocket.com blog.webf.zone badootech.badoo.com blog.cloudboost.io
